entities.name: scarhead
entities.description: A location where Malfoy is standing, described as 'there'.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student, mentioned by name and action (shooting underneath Scarhead).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned by name and action (avoiding a Bludger).

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A heavy black ball used in Quidditch, described as 'pelt[ing] towards him'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Harry's brother, mentioned by name and action (streaking past Harry with a club).

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A Quidditch team, mentioned as the target of George's actions.

relationships.description: George hits the Bludger with his club to knock it back towards Slytherin.
Malfoy is standing at Scarhead, as indicated by Malfoy's action of shooting underneath it.
